alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 10:26AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Volusia County through 1100 AM EDT... At 1025 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ormond-By-the-Sea, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daytona Beach, Ormond Beach, Holly Hill, Ormond-By-the-Sea and Ormond Beach Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. On rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
